name: Down Bad Gaming
description: Down Bad Gaming is powered by the UP GOOD Protocol, a system engineered to burn the supply of $DOWNBAD toward zero and make holders up good. Every transaction incurs a 2.5% fee that is permanently burned, creating continuous deflation and sustainable upward pressure over time. The protocol was built to usher in a new era of community coins on Solana, driven not by promises or hype, but by code, belief, and unstoppable mechanics.
